newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse index edges lower in higher trade.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse index edges lower in higher trade.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index on Friday closed down by 0.45 percent in higher trade, bourse sources said.
The 31-share index closed at 492.66 points, down from 494.90 on Thursday.
Total volume was 2.51 million dinars against 2.18 million dinars over the previous session.
Over-the-counter exchanges amounted to 1.56 million dinars.
Airline Tunis Air was up 0.1 dinar to 23.7 dinars with 6,474 shares changing hands.
Banque Internationale Arabe de Tunisie fell 0.96 dinar to 33.94 dinars.

Investment fend SPDIT-SICAF slid 0.55 dinar to 17.85. Household firm Ateliers Mecaniques du sahel was down 0.37 dinar to 12.18 dinars. Placement de Tunisie eased 0.35 dinar to 12.5. Investment fund Tuninvest -SICAF edged lower 0.34 dinar to 11.86 dinars.
UIB bank declined 0.34 dinar to 12.02. Banque de l'Habitat was down 0.18 dinar to 17.9 dinars.
Most of the trade was on leasing firm Tunisie Leasing LEAS.TN with 11,500 shares changing hands at the unchanged price of 32 dinars. ($1=1.08 dinar)
